Question: Subsequently Nike spun off the ____ line into its own division named the "this person Brand".
Hints: This led to a so-called "freeze-out" on this person, where players refused to pass him the ball throughout the game.
Malone jostled with Rodman and caught the pass, but this person cut behind him and swatted the ball out of his hands for a steal.
This person listed his Highland Park mansion for sale in 2012.
